title: Settings
content:
# Settings

2022-07-03 18:44

Click the settings icon in the bottom-left corner to enter the settings interface. The settings mainly contains following ways:

- Global settings or workspace settings about the editor and other coding related settings.

- Shortcuts settings.

- Appearance settings such as theme of color and icon.

![Settings](https://gw.alipayobjects.com/mdn/rms_5158ba/afts/img/A*XZqdQ7OuIuMAAAAAAAAAAAAAARQnAQ#align=left&display=inline&height=1622&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&originHeight=1622&originWidth=2880&status=done&style=stroke&width=2880)
